channel.title: paddling on Stitch-n-Glue
channel.description: Recent content in paddling on Stitch-n-Glue

item.title: 21. Let's Travel!
item.description: Time to Load and Go! Months of browsing ads on Facebook Marketplace finally paid off with the purchase of a great trailer. It was one of few used trailers having a clean title.

item.title: 20. Launch!
item.description: At last it is time to launch these vessels and see how they perform. The first will be a family-only “soft” launch event. Later I’ll schedule a public “launch party”.
